00045 vector<string> caen_boston_bank_names;
00046 static unsigned int nSamples;
00047 static unsigned int nPreSamples;

00049 ANA_MODULE MDT5720ProcessRaw_module =
00050 {
00051   "MDT5720ProcessRaw",            /* module name           */
00052   "Vladimir Tishchenko",         /* author                */
00053   module_event_caen,                  /* event routine         */

00063 /*-- Number of channels in DT5720 -----------------------------------*/
00064 static const int NCHAN = 4;
00065 
00066 /*-- Histogram declaration -----------------------------------------*/
00067 static TH2* hNDT5720IslandsReadPerBlock;
00068 
00069 /*--module init routine --------------------------------------------*/
00070 INT module_init()
00071 {
00072 
00073   hNDT5720IslandsReadPerBlock = new TH2I(
00074     "hNDT5720IslandsReadPerBlock",
00075     "Number of CAEN Islands read by block",
00076     1,0,1, 3000,0,3000);
00077   hNDT5720IslandsReadPerBlock->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00078 
00079   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00080   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00081       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00082     
00083     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00084     
00085     // We only want the CAEN banks here
00086     if (TSetupData::IsBostonCAEN(bankname))
00087       caen_boston_bank_names.push_back(bankname);
00088   }
00089   
00090    /*** Get necessary data from ODB ***/
00091   char key[80];
00092   int size;
00093   unsigned int post_trigger_percentage;
00094 
00095   // Get Trigger Time Tag info
00096   // Timestamp will be shifted by number of presamples
00097 
00098   sprintf(key, "/Equipment/Crate 5/Settings/CAEN/waveform length");
00099   size = sizeof(nSamples);
00100   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key, &nSamples, &size, TID_DWORD, 1);
00101   sprintf(key, "/Equipment/Crate 5/Settings/CAEN/post_trigger_size");
00102   size = sizeof(post_trigger_percentage);
00103   db_get_value(hDB, 0, key, &post_trigger_percentage, &size, TID_BYTE, 1);
00104   //nPreSamples = (int) (0.01 * ((100 - post_trigger_percentage) * nSamples));
00105   nPreSamples = 20; // From the Golden Data, it looks like there are 20 presamples.
00106                     // The frontend does not seem to correctly load post_trigger_size
00107                     // onto the CAEN.
00108   
00109   return SUCCESS;
00110 }
00111 
00112 /*-- module event routine -----------------------------------------*/
00113 INT module_event_caen(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00114 {
00115   // Some typedefs
00116   
00117   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00118   typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00119   typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00120 
00121   // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00122   // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00123   TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00124     gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00125     
00126   // Delete the islands found in the previous block. Don't clear
00127   // the map of (bank_name, vector) pairs. Once we use a bank name
00128   // once, it will have a (possibly empty) entry in this map for the
00129   // whole run. JG: the islands.clear() line causes seg fault for > 1 TPulseIslandPair
00130   /*for(map_iterator iter = pulse_islands_map.begin();
00131       iter != pulse_islands_map.end(); iter++){
00132     vector<TPulseIsland*>& islands = iter->second;
00133     // Delete the pointers to TPulseIslands, then clear the vector
00134     for(unsigned int j=0; j<islands.size(); j++) {
00135       if(islands[j]) { delete islands[j]; islands[j] = NULL; }
00136     }
00137     islands.clear();
00138     pulse_islands_map.erase(iter); // AE: need to erase the key so that blocks after the first will be recorded
00139   }*/    
00140     
00141   // Get the event number
00142   int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00143 
00144   BYTE *pdata;
00145 
00146   //  printf("In caen ER!\n");
00147 
00148   char bank_name[8];
00149   sprintf(bank_name,"CND%i",0); // one MIDAS bank per board
00150   unsigned int bank_len = bk_locate(pevent, bank_name, &pdata);
00151 
00152   //  printf("MIDAS bank [%s] size %d ----------------------------------------\n",bank_name,bank_len);
00153 
00154   /* uncomment when have real data
00155   if ( bank_len == 0 )
00156     {
00157       return SUCCESS;
00158     }
00159   */
00160   
00161 
00162   uint32_t *p32 = (uint32_t*)pdata;
00163   uint32_t *p32_0 = (uint32_t*)pdata;
00164 
00165   
00166   while ( (p32 - p32_0)*4 < bank_len )
00167     {
00168 
00169       uint32_t caen_event_cw = p32[0]>>28;
00170       //      printf("CW: %08x\n",caen_event_cw);
00171       if ( caen_event_cw != 0xA )
00172         {
00173           printf("***ERROR! Wrong data format it dt5720: incorrect control word 0x%08x\n", caen_event_cw);
00174           return SUCCESS;
00175         }
00176       
00177       uint32_t caen_event_size = p32[0] & 0x0FFFFFFF;
00178       //      printf("caen event size: %i\n",caen_event_size);
00179       
00180       uint32_t caen_channel_mask = p32[1] & 0x000000FF;
00181       // count the number of channels in the event
00182       int nchannels = 0;
00183       for (int ichannel=0; ichannel<NCHAN; ichannel++ )
00184         {
00185           if ( caen_channel_mask & (1<<ichannel) ) nchannels++; 
00186         }
00187       //      printf("caen channel mask: 0x%08x (%i)\n",caen_channel_mask,nchannels);
00188       
00189       uint32_t caen_event_counter = p32[2] & 0x00FFFFFF;
00190       //      printf("caen event counter: %i\n",caen_event_counter);
00191       
00192       // PW: There seems to be a factor of 2 missing between the timestamp and real timestamp
00193       uint32_t caen_trigger_time = 2*p32[3];
00194       //      printf("caen trigger time: %i\n",caen_trigger_time);// = clock ticks?
00195       
00196       // number of samples per channel
00197       unsigned int nsamples = ((caen_event_size-4)*2) / nchannels;
00198       //      printf("waveform length: %i\n",nsamples);
00199 
00200       // Loop through the channels (i.e. banks)
00201       for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator bankNameIter = caen_boston_bank_names.begin();
00202            bankNameIter != caen_boston_bank_names.end(); bankNameIter++) {
00203         
00204         vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulse_islands = pulse_islands_map[*(bankNameIter)];
00205         std::vector<int> sample_vector;
00206         int ichannel = bankNameIter - caen_boston_bank_names.begin();
00207 
00208         //      printf("TGlobalData bank [%s] ----------------------------------------\n", (*bankNameIter).c_str());
00209         //      printf("Number of TPulseIslands already existing = %d\n", pulse_islands.size());
00210         //      printf("*-- channel %i -------------------------------------------------------------*\n",ichannel);
00211 
00212         if ( caen_channel_mask & (1<<ichannel) )
00213           {
00214             // channel enabled
00215             unsigned int isample = 0;
00216             unsigned int nwords = nsamples/2;
00217 
00218             for (int iword=0; iword<nwords; iword++)
00219               {
00220                 
00221                 for (int isubword=0; isubword<2; isubword++)
00222                   {
00223                     uint32_t adc;
00224                     
00225                     if (isubword == 0 )
00226                       adc = (p32[4+iword+ichannel*nwords] & 0x3fff);
00227                     else 
00228                       adc = ((p32[4+iword+ichannel*nwords] >> 16) & 0x3fff);
00229                       
00230                     //printf("CAEN DT5720 channel %d: adc[%i] = %i\n", ichannel, isample, adc);
00231                     //              h2_v1724_pulses[ichannel]->Fill(isample,adc);
00232                     isample++;
00233                       
00234                     sample_vector.push_back(adc);
00235 
00236                   }
00237               }
00238               
00239             pulse_islands.push_back(new TPulseIsland(caen_trigger_time - nPreSamples, sample_vector, *bankNameIter));
00240           }
00241       }
00242 
00243       // *** updated by VT: align data by 32bit 
00244       p32 += caen_event_size + (caen_event_size%2);
00245       //      printf("offset: %i bank size: %i\n", (int)(p32-p32_0), bank_len);
00246 
00247     }
00248     
00249   // print for testing
00250   if(midas_event_number == 1) {
00251     // Loop through all the banks and print an output (because this ProcessRaw loops through pulses then banks, it has been put here)
00252     for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator bankNameIter = caen_boston_bank_names.begin();
00253          bankNameIter != caen_boston_bank_names.end(); bankNameIter++) {
00254       
00255       vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulse_islands = pulse_islands_map[*(bankNameIter)];
00256       printf("TEST MESSAGE: Read %d events from bank %s in event %d\n",
00257              pulse_islands.size(),
00258              (*(bankNameIter)).c_str(),
00259              midas_event_number);
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263   return SUCCESS;
00264 }
